statements: DELETE FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE change_id = 1 AND user_id = 101
DELETE FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE user_id = 202 AND change_date > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE change_date = '2022-01-01' AND id = 2001;
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND log_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM device_configurations WHERE config_date > '2022-04-15' AND device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM network_devices WHERE device_name = 'Router1');
